news.title: MI5 lied ‘deliberately and repeatedly’ in neo-Nazi spy case, BBC tells High Court
news.summary: MI5 apologises for false evidence but says contempt of court proceedings would not be “appropriate”.

news.title: Jeremy Bowen: Killings near Gaza aid centre will deepen criticism of Israel's new distribution system
news.summary: Western diplomats are looking on with dismay at the killing of hungry Gazans near aid hubs.

news.title: Madeleine search officers dig at abandoned building in Portugal
news.summary: Authorities say the new search will be across 21 plots and will continue until Friday.

news.title: Ukraine says it hit Crimea bridge with underwater explosives
news.summary: Kyiv's security service says it it used more than 1,000kg of TNT to mine the supports of Russia's Kerch Bridge.

news.title: Has good weather helped to fuel record small boat crossings?
news.summary: New figures show the number of "red days" - when conditions are considered favourable for crossings.

news.title: Brits could face death for Bali 'Angel Delight' drugs plot
news.summary: The trio are accused of being involved with smuggling cocaine disguised as packets of Angel Delight.

news.title: South Korean opposition wins presidency after months of political chaos
news.summary: Lee Jae-myung was voted in exactly six months after his predecessor made a failed martial law bid.

news.title: Lower energy costs make retirement less expensive
news.summary: A one-person household needs £13,400 a year for a basic standards of living in retirement, a report suggests.

news.title: Dutch government collapses after far-right leader quits coalition
news.summary: The decision, which sparked anger among Geert Wilders' coalition partners, will pave the way for new elections in the Netherlands.

news.title: Schoolgirl known as Child Q 'physically violated' in police strip search, hearing told
news.summary: Three officers are facing gross misconduct proceedings over the strip-search of a 15-year-old girl.
